How does it work?

After creating a tipbox, you get a unique secret URL that you can share with any group of people from which you want to collect anonymous feedback or tips (your team, a facebook or linkedin group, your twitter followers, etc.).

Tips are sent to you by email. You can only reply to the tips you receive if the tipster left us their email address. Emails addresses are never shared with anyone (we proxy emails like Craigslist does).
